it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class TurnManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.TurnManager

  • class TurnManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is at a lower level than RoundManager It handles the operations and the logic relating to a player's turn phase

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  TurnManager.Checks
      A static class where belongs all checks of every toolcard.

      • cancelOperation

        boolean cancelOperation(java.lang.String username)
        Cancel the current operation and return to the precedent state
        Parameters:
        username - of the current player
        Returns:
        true if board, draftpool and roundtracker are correctly restored, false otherwise

      • undo

        Undo the current operation
        Parameters:
        username - of the current player
        Returns:
        true if the state is not YOUR_TURN, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        toolCardId - index of toolcard selected
        Returns:

      • passTurn

        boolean passTurn(java.lang.String username)
        Pass the current player's turn. In case it's a forced pass, it cancels the current operation.
        Parameters:
        username - of the player
        Returns:
        true if successfully passed the turn
